summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4708 for the improvement of 35th Avenue North from East Thomas Street to the south line of Coulter's Addition, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54527, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
